Articles.Content: For instance, my abort action for the initial stage is supposed to shutdown the main engine, decouple the solids and fire the thrusters to separate them from the core booster, decouple the landing pod and fire the escape tower. The groups are right, it's just some of the commands don't fire. The main engine does not shut down, the solids do not decouple and the sep motors to push them away do not fire. The escape tower and decoupling on the pod do work however. So it's only some of the commands that don't work. How would I go about generating logs for this? Launch a ship, fire the abort command and then land and end the mission?
